import React from 'react'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import { Nav, Container, Navbar, Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import About from '../components/About'; import Technical from '../components/Technical'; import Projects from '../components/Projects'; import Experience from '../components/Experience'; import Education from '../components/Education'; import Contacts from '../components/Contacts'; function NavHeader() { return (
Lwandiso Ntlanga
About Skills Projects Experience Education Contacts
About I have a strong working background in fast-paced environments and have worked in EdTech as a Code reviewer, Operations, Sales, Marketing and Tutoring where I developed strong organisation, communication, transferable and problem-solving skills.{
} I recently graduated from a HyperionDev Software Engineering bootcamp and aspire to further master my skills as well as learn new skills to build my career into a leadership role.{
} Currently seeking an opportunity to leverage my newly found skill set in a positive and advantageous way whilst also gaining valuable experience and skills, I am also upskilling through Udemy courses to keep up with the current market requirements.
}> }> }> }> }> }>
); } export default NavHeader;
